attributes.action: Dye Alistair Darlings eyebrows so they match his hair...
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I cannot concentrate watching him on the tv when he's introducing new sensible taxes like "breathing tax and "Walking Tax"
 I go into a haze caused by the  high contrast between his hair and eyebrows. 

Please Mr Brown get the hair dye out in the next cabinet meeting (if you can't decide on the colour have a debate in the commons I'm sure Mr cameron will have some good suggestions)

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
